amendment.description: Amendment requires the President to report to Congress on any border closure or economic or commercial blockade by any newly independent state of the former Soviet Union that impedes the delivery of U.S. humanitarian aid.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the President to report to Congress on any border closures or the use of an economic or commercial blockade by or against any of the new independent states of the former Soviet Union against any other country.
